page.title: 15FAMILY LIFE:-3. by Jenny.
page.content: I live on the A5 (Watling Street).It is a very busy and noisy road.In my family there are four people. My dad works as a salesman for a company called Deltech.My mum used to be an auxillary nurse until she had my brother.Now my mum stays at home and is just a housewife. My brother,David,is fourteen and is at Atherstone School.I am twelve and go to Baddesley Ensor Middle School. My house is detatched,with four floors It has a little garden at the front and an even smaller one at the back.We have six cats and ten goldfish. I go to Girl Guides on a Monday evening,Theatre Workshop in Atherstone on a Wednesday,and Youth Club on Thursday. When I leave school I would like to be a vet or,at least,work with animals.
